top.author: @ecomhoucem
top.text: Email deliverability benchmarks that actually matter: → Open rate: above 33% → Click rate: above 1% → Bounce rate: below 1% → Unsubscribe: below 0.3% → Spam complaints: below 0.01% Miss these, and Gmail assumes you're spam.
top.translationZh:
真正重要的邮件送达率指标：
→ 打开率：超过33%
→ 点击率：超过1%
→ 退信率：低于1%
→ 取消订阅率：低于0.3%
→ 垃圾邮件投诉率：低于0.01%

达不到这些标准，Gmail直接把你当垃圾邮件处理。
